receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
receiptStandards.rule: Document must show vendor name or merchant name that provided goods/services

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
receiptStandards.rule: Document must show purchase date when transaction occurred

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
receiptStandards.rule: Document must show amount and currency - total amount must match submitted expense amount

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
receiptStandards.rule: Document must show details of the item for which reimbursement is being claimed

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi
receiptStandards.rule: VAT amount should be listed clearly on the invoice if applicable

receiptStandards.expense_type: Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Professional services
receiptStandards.rule: On expenses over IDR 5 million the supporting documents must be in the company's name with a proper tax invoice
Workers name and details should generally be used on invoices where required

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Reimbursement of airfare ticket for personal trip (expatriate employee round trip ticket to home country) is taxable BIK - subject to gross-up. Business trip airfare is non-taxable
Personal meals during business trip are taxable BIK - subject to gross-up. Business lunch/entertainment with client/prospect client/vendor is non-taxable
Mobile phone bills/credit and internet billing are taxable BIK - subject to gross-up
Reimbursement of fuel and toll from car rental or on private car used is taxable BIK - subject to gross-up. Mileage reimbursement rates are at employer discretion
Reimbursement of purchasing office supplies is non-taxable - no gross-up required
Reimbursement of trainings is non-taxable - no gross-up required
Reimbursement of taxi for visiting client office, government/tax office for business purpose is non-taxable - no gross-up required

Business expenses related to workers completing their job might be tax exempt - other expenses are subject to varying tax rules including PPh 21 Tax Rate. Only purely business related elements will be tax free, anything additional will be subject to tax
Car rental dedicated for employee and the car is parked at the employee's home (not parked in the office) is taxable BIK. Reimbursement of car rental used during business trip is non-taxable
Reimbursement of medical claims personal and medical insurance premium (additional insurance provided to employee and family on top of mandatory benefit) are taxable BIK
House rental provided to employee is taxable BIK

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Any expense or travel allowance submitted without a receipt or invoice will be taxable

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Expenses that fall under taxable income will be treated as per the local regulations

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business purpose must be established clearly - any expense where business purpose cannot be established will be rejected or postponed
For mileage reimbursements, include To and Fro locations, distance travelled and per diem rates

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Convert amount in local currency and include currency & exchange rate used for foreign currency expenses
Name of clients/vendor in the expense report for business meal with clients/vendor must be provided

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Workers set up under Papaya's Partner EoS must submit expenses via their expenses template before the 15th of each month along with the VAT invoices

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Receipts and invoices must be submitted with expenses - online copies are sufficient, hard copy is not required

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: When working with Papaya's Partner EoS the hard copy original invoices and receipts need to be sent to the company's office address as required for tax and audit process

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expense submissions must have an itemized report along with clear receipts - properly labeled receipts for identification

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Training, Mileage, Taxi, Professional services
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Tax exemptions will only be applied providing sufficient proof is shared e.g. tax receipts, invoices etc
